name: Vermont
description:
The stars.

A cool breeze. 

A half forgotten memory. 

A short walk through a field at night. 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~CONTROLS~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

W/A/S/D or Arrow Keys - Movement

Mouse - Look 

Click - Pick up cans in the basement

Shift - Continue through text
